remarks: Composition of two sections.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
sectco.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
sectco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
sectco.s $e |- S = ( Sect ` C ) $.
sectco.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
sectco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
sectco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
sectco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
sectco.1 $e |- ( ph -> F ( X S Y ) G ) $.
sectco.2 $e |- ( ph -> H ( Y S Z ) K ) $.
sectco $p |- ( ph -> ( H ( <. X , Y >. .x. Z ) F ) ( X S Z ) ( G ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) K ) ) $.
